help-file.title: GITHYANKI
help-file.content:
Coming from the Astral plane, this race of evil humanoids were slaves of the Illtihid race millennia ago. The Githyanki broke away from their former masters after learning many of their mental powers, and learning how to be pure evil.
Githyanki HATE their former masters more then anything and will instantly attack them on site! Giths will go out of their way to hunt down and kill any illithid they can find. Githyanki do not have a normal hometown but must start on the astral plane, in a fortress of Githyanki there. As newly adult Giths they must now venture to the prime plane and make a name for themselves.
Githyanki look much like humans only slightly taller, much more thin, with faces that resemble a decomposing corpse. They tend to be ruthless and significantly smarter than humans.
Class list: Warrior, Anti-Paladin, Sorcerer, Necromancer, Bard, Psionicist, Conjurer. Innate abilities: levitate, ultravision, shift_prime, shift_astral
Warning: As one of the eight evil races on Duris, the Githyanki are extremely difficult to play and face many hardships. Their hometown has been specifically designed to make life hell and death waits around every corner. Githyanki will most certainly encounter situations that would be deemed "unfair" to any of the surface races. We did this to create a new challenge for those advanced players who have "beaten" the challenge of life on the surface world and are looking for something more difficult. You should NOT play a Githyanki unless you are a *very* advanced player and are used to the Duris style of MUDding, or are willing to face the hardships without complaint, as it will NOT be easy.
